Picking the Text

February 11, 2006

If you aren't already familiar with it, check out the website at Textweek -- it offers links to each week's lectionary texts and many other scripture study and worship planning resources often keyed to that collection of texts.Â  A clean, lectionary-texts only site can be found here.
